segments.text: Would you give me some fruits ? How much are these oranges ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I'll take five of the seventy cent ones , and those grapefruits sweet ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure ! They are very fresh , first of all . We sell at a bargain , and you make a wise purchase if you buy them today . Eighty cents only , a piece .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I follow you and I'll take three just for my trial .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you very much and anything else ?
segments.speaker: S2
